comment: This is generated by ESQL's AbstractFunctionTestCase. Do no edit it. See ../README.md for how to regenerate it.
name: mv_pseries_weighted_sum
description: Converts a multivalued expression into a single valued column containing the weighted sum applying P-Series.

params.name: p
params.description: It is a constant number that represents the 'p' parameter in the P-Series.It impacts every element's contribution to the weighted sum.

examples:
ROW data = [70.0, 45.0, 21.0, 21.0, 21.0]
| EVAL score = MV_PSERIES_WEIGHTED_SUM(data, 1.5)
| KEEP score
